ComicInfo.Title: And Introducing--Karma! She Possesses People!; Cry--Vengeance!
ComicInfo.Summary:
And Introducing--Karma! She Possesses People!: A new mutant forcibly recruits Spider-Man and The Fantastic Four in her bid to free her little brother and sister from her manipulative uncle.
Cry--Vengeance!: Storm and the Black Panther confront an old enemy from their past.
